text:
latest solaris 11
# pkg info entire | grep Version
          Version: 0.5.11 (Oracle Solaris 11.3.17.5.0)

# ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache-mike    --enable-mods-shared=all    --enable-so    --enable-suexec    --enable-rewrite    --with-included-apr    --enable-http    --enable-proxy    --enable-proxy-connect    --enable-proxy-ftp    --enable-proxy-http    --enable-proxy-ajp    --enable-proxy-balancer    --enable-file-cache    --enable-disk-cache    --enable-cache    --enable-mem-cache    --enable-deflate    --enable-cgi    --enable-cgid    --enable-ssl    --with-ssl=/usr/local    --with-mpm=worker
<SKIP>
# make (tried gmake too)
<SKIP>
/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile gcc -std=gnu99 -I/usr/include/libxml2 -g -O2      -DSOLARIS2=11 -D_POSIX_PTHREAD_SEMANTICS -D_REENTRANT -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE     -I. -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/os/unix -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/include -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/include -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr-util/include -I/usr/include/pcre -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/aaa -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/cache -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/core -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/database -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/filters -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/ldap -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/server -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/loggers -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/lua -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/proxy -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/session -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/ssl -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/test -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/server -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/arch/unix -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/dav/main -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/generators -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/mappers -prefer-pic -c regexp.c && touch regexp.slo
/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -std=gnu99 -I/usr/include/libxml2 -g -O2           -o mod_sed.la -rpath /usr/local/apache-mike/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_sed.lo sed0.lo sed1.lo regexp.lo -export-symbols-regex sed_module
/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool[1086]: eval: syntax error at line 1: `|' unexpected
gmake[4]: *** [mod_sed.la] Error 3
gmake[4]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/filters'
gmake[3]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
gmake[3]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/filters'
gmake[2]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
gmake[2]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules'
gmake[1]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25'
gmake: *** [all-recursive] Error 1


Important note: if run this way all compiles
# ./configure && make
creator: mike.pechkin@gmail.com

text:
if i do 
# export PATH=/usr/gnu/bin:$PATH
# my huge configure && make
then it fails on this somewhere in the middle

/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile gcc -std=gnu99  -g -O2      -DSOLARIS2=11 -D_POSIX_PTHREAD_SEMANTICS -D_REENTRANT -D_LARGEFILE64_SOURCE     -I. -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/os/unix -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/include -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/include -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr-util/include -I/usr/include/pcre -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/aaa -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/cache -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/core -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/database -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/filters -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/ldap -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/server -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/loggers -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/lua -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/proxy -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/session -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/ssl -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/test -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/server -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/arch/unix -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/dav/main -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/generators -I/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/mappers -prefer-pic -c mod_vhost_alias.c && touch mod_vhost_alias.slo
/root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool: line 960: write to 1 failed [No space left on device]
libtool: compile: Failed to create `.libs'
make[4]: *** [mod_vhost_alias.slo] Error 1
make[4]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/mappers'
make[3]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules/mappers'
make[2]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25/modules'
make[1]: *** [shared-build-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory `/root/httpd-2.4.25'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1


this error seen *sometimes* when I do <make clean>
creator: mike.pechkin@gmail.com
mike.pechkin@gmail.com
text:
helps only this combination:

export PATH=/usr/gnu/bin:$PATH
export SHELL=/bin/bash 
export NM=/usr/gnu/bin/nm 
export MAKE=gmake 
./configure ...
make

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text:
(In reply to Mike from comment #1)
> if i do 
> # export PATH=/usr/gnu/bin:$PATH
> # my huge configure && make
> then it fails on this somewhere in the middle
>
> /root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool: line 960: write to 1 failed [No space
> left on device]

Which states that your filesystem where you compile is full.

creator: mike.pechkin@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to Ruediger Pluem from comment #3)
> (In reply to Mike from comment #1)
> > if i do 
> > # export PATH=/usr/gnu/bin:$PATH
> > # my huge configure && make
> > then it fails on this somewhere in the middle
> >
> > /root/httpd-2.4.25/srclib/apr/libtool: line 960: write to 1 failed [No space
> > left on device]
> 
> Which states that your filesystem where you compile is full.

filesystem was not full.

creator: jim@apache.org
text:
Under Solaris, as with many UNIX and UNIX-like systems, NOSPACE is also used when the kernel runs out of various kernel level resources, like semaphores, shared-memory, etc... Its just how those errors bubble up.

Look at 'ipcs'

creator: mike.pechkin@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to Jim Jagielski from comment #5)
> Under Solaris, as with many UNIX and UNIX-like systems, NOSPACE is also used
> when the kernel runs out of various kernel level resources, like semaphores,
> shared-memory, etc... Its just how those errors bubble up.
> 
> Look at 'ipcs'

i agree. confirm.
Closing as invalid, it seems that the issue was related to OS resource exhaustion. Please re-open if needed :)
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
